description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Trou d'Eau Douce, Mauritius. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Mauritius Five-Star Beachfront Paradise with Private Island & Two Championship Golf Courses
hotels.description: Palm-fringed paradise is found on the peaceful shores of Trou dâ€™Eau Douce at Shangri-La Le Touessrok, a five-star beachfront hideaway in an out-of-this-world tropical setting. Located on its own private sweep of coastline, the resort features its own private island and complimentary access to two championship 18-hole golf courses. When you're ready to be wined and dined, take your pick among eight dining options: feast on fresh sushi at Kushi restaurant, sample authentic Indian and Mauritian dishes at Safran restaurant, or sip heavenly cocktails at Sega Bar.

seo.title: Hotel a Trou d'Eau Douce - Mauritius Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Trou d'Eau Douce, Mauritius con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
